tagline: Portfolio-level visibility and execution control for home lending operations.
proof: I can design portfolio control systems that surface delivery risk early and help leaders intervene before SLAs and customers are impacted.
problem: Home lending portfolios span dozens of programs across origination, underwriting, closing, and funding. Status is fragmented across tools, risks surface late, and leadership lacks a single operational truth for intervention.
impact: Earlier visibility into SLA and delivery risk across the lending portfolio.

description: MortgageOps is a hypothetical internal control tower for JPMorgan Chase Home Lending.
It provides executives and portfolio operators with a real-time view of execution health, bottlenecks, and intervention levers across the lending lifecycle.
